edu.byu.cs.superasteroids.model_classes.visible_objects

Class Asteroid

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.byu.cs.superasteroids.model_classes.visible_objects.VisibleObject

          • edu.byu.cs.superasteroids.model_classes.visible_objects.Asteroid
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    GrowingAsteroid, Octeroid

    public class Asteroid
extends MovingObject
    Created by Marshall Garey This class is a container for info about an asteroid and is a superclass for the various types of asteroids.
